ingredients: 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped
1 cup corn (from 2 cobs or can use frozen) (see notes)
2 cups cooked chicken breast, small diced (see notes)
Optional toppings: crushed tortillas, shredded cheddar or Monterey or Jalapeno Jack cheese, avocado, salsa
